1. Rockshow (The Relic, Treasure Planet)
This movie combines live rock music performances with a fictional story. The film features a variety of well-known musicians performing their own songs.
2. The Relic (Rockshow, Treasure Planet)
This movie is a sequel to the previously mentioned Rockshow movie. In this movie, we follow up on the adventures of various rock bands in the fictional town of Las Vegas. This movie has received generally positive reviews from critics and audiences alike.
3. Treasure Planet (Rockshow, The Relic))
This movie follows the adventures of a young boy named Dave Stilson who is on a quest to find a treasure hidden by his great-great-grandfather William "Stilson" Stilson who was the first person in America to ever become rich and famous overnight. Dave Stilson learns from his great-great-grandfather's story that he must be very careful not to fall into any traps or illusions set up by anyone else who might try to hurt him or even kill him.
